MonsterTrait.Name: Evasive
MonsterTrait.Text: Against effects that allow a Dexterity saving throw for half damage, the derro takes no damage on a successful save, and only half damage on a failed one.

MonsterTrait.Name: Insanity
MonsterTrait.Text: The derro has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

MonsterTrait.Name: Magic Resistance
MonsterTrait.Text: The derro has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MonsterTrait.Name: Shadowstrike
MonsterTrait.Text: The derro's weapon attacks deal 9 (2d8) necrotic damage (included in its Actions list).

MonsterTrait.Name: Spellcasting
MonsterTrait.Text: The derro is a 5th level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). The derro has the following paladin spells prepared: 1st level (4 slots): hellish rebuke, inflict wounds, shield of faith, wrathful smite 2nd level (2 slots): aid, crown of madness, darkness, magic weapon

MonsterTrait.Name: Sunlight Sensitivity
MonsterTrait.Text: While in sunlight, the derro shadow antipaladin has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The derro makes two scimitar attacks or two heavy crossbow attacks.

MonsterAction.Name: Scimitar
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) necrotic damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Heavy Crossbow
MonsterAction.Text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target, Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) necrotic damage.

MonsterTrait.Name: Infectious Insanity (Recharge 5-6)
MonsterTrait.Text: The derro chooses a creature it can see within 30 feet and magically assaults its mind. The creature must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be affected as if by a confusion spell for 1 minute. An affected creature repeats the saving throw at the end of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
